name: basic-express
description: * start from the up-to-date master branch (`git checkout master; git pull origin master`) * Create a feature branch named 'basic-express' (`git checkout -b basic-express`) * modify the files in this directory to have the required features * add, commit, and push the branch to github * Create a PR to merge to master * Be sure to include the reviewer(s)   * Due by Sun Sep 29, 11:59pm
